text: Panfilo "Ping" Morena Lacson Sr. (; born June 1, 1948) is a Filipino politician and former police general. He became a Senator of the Philippines in 2016. He has also been a Senator from 2001 to 2013. He was the Director General of the Philippine National Police (PNP) from 1999 to 2001. He was a candidate for President of the Philippines in the 2004 presidential election. He unsuccessfully ran for president again in 2016, he later decided to run for the senate. Lacson unsuccessfully ran for president again in the 2022 election as an independent candidate. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Police officers Category:Politicians from Calabarzon
title: Panfilo Lacson
